about_the_game:
Rebuild your Town Block by Block

You are part of the world. Explore, collect materials, craft tools, and build the buildings of your city by placing blocks in the right shapes


Unleash your inner Dyke Warden

Reclaim the Flooded Lands: Build a system of dykes and pump out the water using windmills. Then grow Tulips in your fresh polders, and trade your way into the Dutch Golden Age


Coziness AND Excitement

During the day, take your time building out your beautiful dutch town & water defenses. Then, when you are ready, face the onslaught of the sea during the night. You determine the pace


Build Organic Towns

No straight grids in this City Builder! The streets in POLDERS are crooked and imperfect, leading to organic, historic looking towns, and interesting spatial puzzles

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu >= 20.04, Arch, or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: For 720p: A graphics card with Vulkan 1.2 support and 3+ GB of video memory: Radeon R9 280, GeForce GTX 780 (at least Kepler architecture, driver 472.12 or newer), Intel Iris Xe, or similar.
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, please
  • Additional Notes: In desktop mode, a mouse with 2 buttons + scroll wheel is necessary for camera control.

short_description: Get ready to polder! POLDERS is a quintessentially Dutch City Builder where the sea level rises, your dikes break, and you’ll have to fight for every piece of land against the relentless sea. Will you turn the tide, or will Your town of Oudehaven be lost forever to the waves of the Waterwolf?
